description: Train as much and as often as you want. Get a total body workout, improve your climbing performance, and save gym fees to spend on gear and road trips.  This guide contains essential information to plan and construct your own indoor or outdoor climbing wall. It includes step by step instructions, equipment lists, information about making your own holds, building plans, and design ideas to maximize your climbing options in the space you have available.
name: Falcon Building Your Own Climbing Wall
